column2: "Na aber a Solomon wiee mpaa bɔ no
column3: ogya fi sor dwirii
column4: na ɔbɛhyeew ɔhyew afɔr na okum afɔr no; na EWURADZE n’enyimnyam bɛhyɛɛ dan no ma."

column2: "Na asɔfo no enntum annhɛn EWURADZE ne dan no mu
column3: osiandɛ EWURADZE n’enyimnyam no ahyɛ EWURADZE ne dan no ma."

column2: "Na aber a ogya no rudwir
column3: na EWURADZE n’enyimnyam reba ofi no do no
column4: Israelmba no nyinara hwɛe; na wɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze dze hɔn enyim butubutuuw famu wɔ abonsɛwee no do sɔree

column2: "Nna ɔhen no na ɔman no nyinara bɔɔ okum afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim."
"Na ɔhen Solomon dze anantwi mpemeduonu ebien
column3: na nguan mpemɔha eduonu bɔɔ okum afɔr. Dɛm na ɔhen no na ɔman no nyinara dze tseew Nyankopɔn fi no ho."

column2: "Na asɔfo no gyinagyina hɔ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn nhwɛdodwuma tsetsee; Levifo no so kitsakitsa EWURADZE no ndwom ho ndzɛmba a ɔhen David yɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa nda EWURADZE ase
column6: aber a David nam hɔn som do yii ayɛw no: na asɔfo no henhɛɛn mbɛn wɔ hɔn enyim; na Israel nyinara gyinagyinaa hɔ."

column2: "Nkyii so Solomon yɛɛ abangua a ɔwɔ EWURADZE fi no enyim no ne finimfin no krɔnkrɔn; na hɔ na ɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column3: na asomdwee afɔr ho seradze no: osiandɛ boran afɔrmbukyia a Solomon yɛe no

column2: "Nna Solomon hyɛɛ fa no aber no mu
column3: nda esuon
column4: na Israel nyinara ka no ho
column6: wofi Hamat ahɛnee dze kodu Egypt ɔwora no ho."

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no wɔbɔɔ ngua a ɔtaa dzinn: na afɔrmbukyia no ne ntsewho no wodzii no nda esuon
column3: na afahyɛ no so nda esuon."

column2: "Na bosoom a otsia esuon no ne da a otsia eduonu ebiasa no
column3: nna ogyaa ɔman no kwan ma wɔkɔr hɔn asesee mu
column4: wɔdze enyigye na akoma pa wɔ yie a EWURADZE ayɛ ama David
column6: na ne man Israel no ntsi."

column2: "Nna Solomon wiee EWURADZE ne fie
column3: na ɔhen ne fie no: na dza ɔbaa Solomon n’akoma mu nyinara dɛ ɔbɛyɛ wɔ EWURADZE ne fie mu
column4: na nankasa ne fie mu nyinara

column2: "Na EWURADZE yii noho kyerɛɛ Solomon anadwe
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column5: na masan mu eyi bea yi ama moho dɛ afɔrbɔ fie."

column2: "Sɛ motow ɔsor mu ma nyankom nntɔ
column3: anaa sɛ mehyɛ mbɛbɛw dɛ wɔmbɛmen asaase no
column4: anaa medze ɔyardɔm ba me man mu;"

column2: "na sɛ me man a wɔdze me dzin frɛ hɔn no brɛ hɔnho adze
column3: na wɔbɔ mpaa
column5: na wɔsan fi hɔn kwan bɔn do a; ɔno mibefi sor metsie
column6: na medze hɔn bɔn akyɛ hɔn
column7: na mayɛ hɔn asaase no edur."

column2: "Afei mubobue m’enyiwa
column3: na makyɛn m’aso

column2: "Na afei na masan mu eyi fie yi na mayɛ no krɔnkrɔn
column3: dɛ me dzin ntsena hɔ daa: na m’enyiwa na m’akoma bɛtsena hɔ daa nyinara."

column2: "Na ɔwo dze
column3: sɛ ebɛnantsew m’enyim dɛ mbrɛ w’egya David nantsewee
column4: na ayɛ dɛ mbrɛ medze ahyɛ wo no nyinara
column5: na edzi m’ahyɛdze na m’atsɛmbu no do a;"

column2: "ɔno mebɛma w’ahendzi ahengua etsim hɔ
column3: dɛ mbrɛ menye w’egya David dzii ahyɛmu
column5: Wɔremma nyimpa a ɔbɛyɛ Israel do ɔhwɛfo mmbɔ wo no."

column2: "Na sɛ hom san
column3: na wɔpow m’ahyɛdze na me mbransɛm a medze esi hom enyim yi
column4: na hom kɔ kɔsom enyame fofor

column2: "ɔno mubotu hɔn efi m’asaase a medze ama hom no do; na ofi a mayɛ no krɔnkrɔn ama me dzin yi
column3: mobɔtow efi m’enyi do akyen
column4: na mayɛ no ɔkasabɛbu na fen wɔ aman nyinara mu."

column2: "Na ofi yi a ɔkrɔn dɛm yi
column3: obiara a obotwa mu wɔ ho no
column6: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na EWURADZE ayɛ asaase yi

column2: "Na wobobua dɛ
column3: Osiandɛ wɔpoow EWURADZE
column4: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn a ɔdze hɔn fii Egypt asaase do bae no
column5: na wɔkɛtae suoo enyame fofor mu sɔɔr hɔn
column6: na wɔsoom hɔn: dɛm ntsi na ɔdze mbusu yi nyinara aba hɔn do yi."
